headline: Can Blackstone (BX) Sustain Its Momentum as Retirement Market Access Reshapes Growth Prospects?
summary: Blackstone Inc. recently reported a very large 48% increase in distributable earnings and surpassed US$1.2 trillion in assets under management, fueled by robust inflows in its Credit & Insurance segment and expansion into AI and healthcare sectors. Recent regulatory changes allowing private equity funds to access the US$12 trillion retirement market position Blackstone to capture significant new investor inflows and reshape its growth outlook. We will explore how Blackstone's milestone...
